hackathon-description-text: The theme of The Overkill festival is “Maze”, we wanted to be in line with this theme and chose a topic that is also a kind of Maze in the brain “Alzheimer” Within the is theme we have several angles that can be chosen in form of a persona. These persona’s will become clear at the beginning of the Game Jam.
hackathon-eligibility: This hackathon is on invite only
hackathon-requirements:
- Upload befor 14.00h on oktober 29th
- Upload everything you made
- Scan your notes and upload them aswell
